messages.message: Okay, another refiner related question — any way to get font information in a refiner program? esp. font type?
This may be possible with a UDF when running in a Flow - the original IBOCR may contain some of that information, although I am not sure exactly what font info is included
got it, thanks — I’ve got a bunch of other stuff to do around getting htis refiner program first; so might want to pick some people’s brains once i’ve gotten the rest of it stood up
@Jesika Haria might have useful tips too -- I believe she implemented this
Yeah it’s not super visible right now and might have changed with some of the new ocr work. Lmk when you get to it
